nano.remexp.broadcaster
Class XMLConfigParser

java.lang.Object
  nano.remexp.broadcaster.XMLConfigParser

public class XMLConfigParser
extends java.lang.Object

This object parses the given xml file and initializes certain important information on the remote experiment broadcaster.

Version:
1.1 23.08.2012
Author:
Dominic Bosch

Constructor Summary
protected XMLConfigParser(java.lang.String path, RemoteExperimentBroadcaster c)
          Initializes and opens the configuration file.
 
Method Summary
protected  boolean processFile()
          This function processes the whole file that was opened during construction time.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

XMLConfigParser

protected XMLConfigParser(java.lang.String path,
                          RemoteExperimentBroadcaster c)
Initializes and opens the configuration file.

Parameters:
path - the path to the xml configuration file
c - the RemoteExperimentBroadcaster that receives commands from the parsed xml file.
Method Detail

processFile

protected boolean processFile()
This function processes the whole file that was opened during construction time. The processed parameters are parsed into commands on the RemoteExperimentBroadcaster.

Returns:
true if everything worked fine, false if an error occurred and the server wasn't initialized properly.
